document.heading: Property Management Reform Amendment Act of 2004

history.narrative: Law 15-238, the “Property Management Reform Amendment Act of 2004”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 15-715, which was referred to the Subcommittee on Human Rights, Latino Affairs and Property. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on September 21, 2004, and October 5, 2004, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on November 1, 2004, it was assigned Act No. 15-578 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 15-238 became effective on March 16, 2005.
